long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmarker is where all your links come together. Adding links is incredibly simple with the browser extension—just a single click. And whenever you open a new tab, your entire collection is instantly at your fingertips.

Bookmarker isn’t limited to just the Chrome browser; it’s cross-browser compatible. You can access your links from anywhere, at any time, quickly and easily. Customize your bookmarks by choosing and adjusting your own background to match your style. Bookmarker also allows you to archive bookmarks.

Enjoy quick access through the fast text search by creating tags or descriptions to easily find your favorite bookmarks. You can also sync your browser with mobile devices at any time. Navigating through your bookmarks is much easier and more organized with page navigation. You can jump to specific folders and manage all your links by topic.

Advanced settings offer countless options, and with the Pro version, you can share your entire collection with others and customize it individually. Bookmarker is completely free if used on a local device. With the advanced option, you can also access all synchronized bookmarks across multiple devices.
